mia #

eleventy source for miriamsuzanne.com

Develop: #

Install dependencies:

yarn

Compile and run Eleventy server, with a watcher for Sass files:

gulp

The site will be compiled into _site/ for simple gh-pages deployment, and the served site will be available at localhost:8080 or e.g. mia.hexxie.com:8080.

You can also run individual commands:

# build the static site
gulp build

# run the server
gulp serve

# minify images
gulp imagemin

# compile sass
gulp sass

# lint sass
gulp sasslint

# format sass
gulp prettier

# compile sass docs
gulp sassdoc

# watch sass files (lint & docs & compile)
gulp watch

Sass Docs are compiled into the _site/style/ folder, which is then available at the URL: /style/.
